mapper.insert: insert INTO vam_board VALUES(BNO_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: update vam_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updatedate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT fno, bno, org_file_name, save_file_name, round(file_size / 1024, 1) as file_size FROM vam_file where bno = #{bno}
